Text: Naturals Indian Basin ExpansionSince we miss each other on the phone thought Id drop you an email Our open season was oversubscribed We plan to expand the project to about MMcfd from the MMcfd quoted in the open season Please advise what if any paperwork you believe we need to put in place for Natural to deliver about MMcfd to TW at the existing Eddy County interconnect Our plan is to replace the existing measurement facilities with a new ultra sonic meter Dampening facilities would be installed due to compression being installed at the point Let me know what other thoughts you might have Duane Kokinda Director Business Development
